episodes.title: How Cults Build Power: An Anthropological Perspective
episodes.description:
Cults form through the same social processes that shape religions, organizations, and political movements: belonging, leadership, identity, ritual, and meaning.

In this video, using an anthropological lens, I explore how high-control groups build power, examine how authority forms, how group identity evolves, and how ordinary people become drawn into tightly structured systems.

Thanks for your time!

#anthropology #cults #socialscience #powerdynamics
